title: 장윤정
content:
장윤정은 서울
공과대학
화학공학과
교수이자
신재생 에너지 전환 시스템 연구실
장을 겸하고 있다.
연락처: 02-2220-0526 / yjang53@hanyang.ac.kr
학력
2012 - 2017 Ph.D, Chemical Engineering, POSTECH, Korea
2008 - 2011 B.S. Chemical Engineering, POSTECH, Korea
경력
2020 - Present Assistant Professor, Department of Chemical Engineering, Hanyang University, Seoul, Korea
2018 - 2020 Postdoctoral Researcher, Department of Chemistry, University of Wisconsin-Madison, USA
2017 - 2018 Postdoctoral Researcher, School of Energy and Chemical engineering, UNIST, Korea
